name: SpaceZot - Commostrad version
description:
After the Arcade version, this is the adpatation made for the Commostrad Computer.

To play the game you have to use the following command line :

LOAD "SPACEZOT.BIN",8,1

You can also use these : 

CAT

PRINT

EXIT

CLS

In this version you can move your ship in all directions, to catch beers and colas lost in space. Your ship is not armed, so avoid Asteroïds.

Have a nice game.
